Игра, в которой нужны железные нервы, ты должен выдерживать в ней - Токсичных тимейтрв, читеров, смурфов. Что бы поднять звание ты должен уметь контролить спрей, качественно двигаться и думать (brain). Игра затягивает и лучше здесь иметь Прайм статус, что бы не портить себе психику читерами. А что бы ещё веселее провести здесь время, советую позвать сюда друзей!
我起了，一枪秒了，有什么好说哒
bad community.. developers only care about overpricing skins to make money

This game literally took my life away from me. I had hopes and dreams once, but now all i care about is the road to global. My paycheck goes to cases and keys. I had to move back into my moms house because I couldn't afford to pay my bills and feed my addiction at the same time. I can barely afford to get gas to go to work anymore and i scare any potential irl friends away because all i talk about is smokes and spray patterns or awesome plays for majors. i haven't been on a date in 4 years because my only love interest is that sweet, sweet CT ass. I nut to the sound of a juicy dink. I don't have a single thing going for me. I can't sleep at night because it takes me away from the game for too long and when i eventually pass out from exhaustion, i dream of being a higher rank. 10/10
You gotta git gud really quick or die trying and thats the entire game
A great competitive game, definitely a staple for any PC gamer.
